name: Revive Roy G Beevee
description:
What does this game have?

1.  Original 2D images.   This includes characters, battlers, background, walls, etc.
2. Mazes with different strategies.  Mazes help critical thinking skills.
3. Battle strategy.  Will you fight or will you run away?
4. Six different challenges.  As the title says, the goal is to Revive Roy G Beevee,
5. Basic scientific learning opportunity.

What does this game not have?

1.  Lethal weapons.  Yes, Roy G Beevee expires at the beginning, but no actor nor enemy actually "dies".
2, There is no hint nor suggestions of the 3rd dimension in the 2D images.
3. Vulgarity nor sexually suggestive images.  I am a public school teacher.
4. Human or humanoid characters.

Who is Mister Jay the Game Maker?
Remember MinisterJay?  Well, that is me.  I started selling educational games to teachers, so I switched my name.  I am a Special Education Teacher.  I am a Christian Pastor.  I make educational and traditional video games and card games.
